column4: hello.  what is the commandline for moving a user to another group please?
see 'man adduser'.  I'm not sure what you mean by "move"
quicktime is in the repositories, no need to compile
show me the second life documentation that tells you you need quicktime
I can only help you if you answer my questions... the quicktime in the repositories is the same as what you are trying to compile
yes, that is why I want you to show the document that tells you what you need
right click on the time applet in your panel and go to preferences
note that I said "preferences" and you said "adjust date and time"
your client tries to join the channel before you are identified
tell your client not to do that :)
